techmeme.title: Bitcoin falls ~5% to ~$81K, ether drops 7%, and Solana falls 13% after President Trump unveiled tariffs; Coinbase's and MicroStrategy's shares fall by 7%+ (Tanaya Macheel/CNBC)
AI video startup Runway raised $308M led by General Atlantic, sources say at a $3B+ valuation, and plans to hire more filmmakers, screenwriters, and others (Bloomberg)
Nintendo Switch 2 hands-on: larger than the Switch without being uncomfortable, flagship games play well, and the Joy-Con's mouse-like mode mostly works well (Andrew Webster/The Verge)
Intel unveils a new slogan, "That's the power of Intel Inside", building on its Intel Inside campaign in 1991; its current marketing focuses on the Core series (Anton Shilov/Tom's Hardware)
Sources: Ireland's DPC will fine TikTok €500M+ before the end of April for illegally shipping European users' data to China, after a lengthy GDPR investigation (Samuel Stolton/Bloomberg)
